name: Stay Choppy
description:
[MiniJam 124 Submission]

You play as John, a man who decided to take a break from his city life and earn some money by chopping trees in the countryside.

Each tree is worth $25, which is also the score, the purpose of which is to purchase upgrades and food so that you can stay warm for longer periods of time.

The goal of the game is to, by the end of John's 3-day work trip, have as much money left in your wallet as possible...

...and also not die to the local Yeti that roams the woods.
